Romancing Wyll in Baldur's Gate 3

Players will need to speak to Wyll back at the camp and ask him about the Goblins and the Tieflings, doing so gets Wyll to open up about why he dislikes Goblins so much. When asked about Wylls glass eye, he decides not to share this because he does not know the player well enough to open up about it.
